title: Joe Glazer - I Will Win 1977
description:
Despite their humorous nickname, the members of Inustrial Workers of the World (IWW) experienced tremendous struggles which were often documented through song. Starting as a one-paged leaflet headed by the words: Sing and fight! Right was the tyrant king who said: Beware of a movement that sings the IWWÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Little Red Song Book soon grew to include dozens of songs including Ralph Chaplins Solidarity Forever.
